Posts.Content: Hi LaVerne. My name is Judy. I had rad 4 yrs ago and it almostburned meup.It took a while to heal. I don't understand your PC doctor. My oncologist says anyone with ca, sometimes needs something for there nerves He uses Zoloft. Ask about it. If you would like to chat my e-mail is evansj22@bellsouth.net
Posts.Title: help--need some advice

Posts.Content: Please remember me in your prayers tomorrow as I go for my Pet Scan to see about the tumors in my lung. thanks Judy P.S, I have really been depressed about this.
Posts.Title: remember me

Posts.Content: Hi all. I went to my plactic surgeron today. I will be having surgery on July 15th. My implant busted and it has to be removed Maybe this will stop some of the pain in my chest. Keep me in your prayers. Judy
